product_name: The North Face Reversible Moondoggy Down Jacket - Toddler Boys'
long_description: Cozy and versatile, The North Face Reversible Moondoggy down jacket for toddler boys quickly alters its look from a classic solid to a fun stripe print. Quilt-stitched nylon shell breathes well and securely holds the down insulation in place. 550-fill-power goose down insulation provides an unsurpassed warmth-to-weight ratio; down is the lightest, warmest and most compressible insulation available. Elasticized hood, cuffs and hem add protection from the elements. The North Face Reversible Moondoggy down jacket features zippered hand pockets on the solid side and welted hand pockets on the striped side.
short_description: Cozy and versatile, The North Face Reversible Moondoggy down jacket for toddler boys quickly alters its look from a classic solid to a fun stripe print.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
